090@Category({ IOTests.class, MediumTests.class })
091public class TestPrefetch {
092  private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(TestPrefetch.class);
093
094  @ClassRule
095  public static final HBaseClassTestRule CLASS_RULE =
096    HBaseClassTestRule.forClass(TestPrefetch.class);
097
098  private static final HBaseTestingUtil TEST_UTIL = new HBaseTestingUtil();
099
100  private static final int NUM_VALID_KEY_TYPES = KeyValue.Type.values().length - 2;
101  private static final int DATA_BLOCK_SIZE = 2048;
102  private static final int NUM_KV = 1000;
103  private Configuration conf;
104  private CacheConfig cacheConf;
105  private FileSystem fs;
106  private BlockCache blockCache;
107
108  @Rule
109  public OpenTelemetryRule otelRule = OpenTelemetryRule.create();
110
111  @Before
112  public void setUp() throws IOException, InterruptedException {
113    conf = TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration();
114    conf.setBoolean(CacheConfig.PREFETCH_BLOCKS_ON_OPEN_KEY, true);
115    fs = HFileSystem.get(conf);
116    blockCache = BlockCacheFactory.createBlockCache(conf);
117    cacheConf = new CacheConfig(conf, blockCache);
118  }
119
120  @Test
121  public void testPrefetchSetInHCDWorks() {
122    ColumnFamilyDescriptor columnFamilyDescriptor = ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder
123      .newBuilder(Bytes.toBytes("f")).setPrefetchBlocksOnOpen(true).build();
124    Configuration c = HBaseConfiguration.create();
125    assertFalse(c.getBoolean(CacheConfig.PREFETCH_BLOCKS_ON_OPEN_KEY, false));
126    CacheConfig cc = new CacheConfig(c, columnFamilyDescriptor, blockCache, ByteBuffAllocator.HEAP);
127    assertTrue(cc.shouldPrefetchOnOpen());
128  }
129
130  @Test
131  public void testPrefetchBlockCacheDisabled() throws Exception {
132    ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor poolExecutor =
133      (ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor) PrefetchExecutor.getExecutorPool();
134    long totalCompletedBefore = poolExecutor.getCompletedTaskCount();
135    long queueBefore = poolExecutor.getQueue().size();
136    ColumnFamilyDescriptor columnFamilyDescriptor =
137      ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(Bytes.toBytes("f")).setPrefetchBlocksOnOpen(true)
138        .setBlockCacheEnabled(false).build();
139    HFileContext meta = new HFileContextBuilder().withBlockSize(DATA_BLOCK_SIZE).build();
140    CacheConfig cacheConfig =
141      new CacheConfig(conf, columnFamilyDescriptor, blockCache, ByteBuffAllocator.HEAP);
142    Path storeFile = writeStoreFile("testPrefetchBlockCacheDisabled", meta, cacheConfig);
143    readStoreFile(storeFile, (r, o) -> {
144      HFileBlock block = null;
145      try {
146        block = r.readBlock(o, -1, false, true, false, true, null, null);
147      } catch (IOException e) {
148        fail(e.getMessage());
149      }
150      return block;
151    }, (key, block) -> {
152      boolean isCached = blockCache.getBlock(key, true, false, true) != null;
153      if (
154        block.getBlockType() == BlockType.DATA || block.getBlockType() == BlockType.ROOT_INDEX
155          || block.getBlockType() == BlockType.INTERMEDIATE_INDEX
156      ) {
157        assertFalse(isCached);
158      }
159    }, cacheConfig);
160    assertEquals(totalCompletedBefore + queueBefore,
161      poolExecutor.getCompletedTaskCount() + poolExecutor.getQueue().size());
162  }
163
164  @Test
165  public void testPrefetchHeapUsageAboveThreshold() throws Exception {
166    ColumnFamilyDescriptor columnFamilyDescriptor =
167      ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(Bytes.toBytes("f")).setPrefetchBlocksOnOpen(true)
168        .setBlockCacheEnabled(true).build();
169    HFileContext meta = new HFileContextBuilder().withBlockSize(DATA_BLOCK_SIZE).build();
170    Configuration newConf = new Configuration(conf);
171    newConf.setDouble(CacheConfig.PREFETCH_HEAP_USAGE_THRESHOLD, 0.1);
172    CacheConfig cacheConfig =
173      new CacheConfig(newConf, columnFamilyDescriptor, blockCache, ByteBuffAllocator.HEAP);
174    Path storeFile = writeStoreFile("testPrefetchHeapUsageAboveThreshold", meta, cacheConfig);
175    MutableInt cachedCount = new MutableInt(0);
176    MutableInt unCachedCount = new MutableInt(0);
177    readStoreFile(storeFile, (r, o) -> {
178      HFileBlock block = null;
179      try {
180        block = r.readBlock(o, -1, false, true, false, true, null, null);
181      } catch (IOException e) {
182        fail(e.getMessage());
183      }
184      return block;
185    }, (key, block) -> {
186      boolean isCached = blockCache.getBlock(key, true, false, true) != null;
187      if (
188        block.getBlockType() == BlockType.DATA || block.getBlockType() == BlockType.ROOT_INDEX
189          || block.getBlockType() == BlockType.INTERMEDIATE_INDEX
190      ) {
191        if (isCached) {
192          cachedCount.increment();
193        } else {
194          unCachedCount.increment();
195        }
196      }
197    }, cacheConfig);
198    assertTrue(unCachedCount.compareTo(cachedCount) > 0);
199  }
200
201  @Test
202  public void testPrefetch() throws Exception {
203    TraceUtil.trace(() -> {
204      Path storeFile = writeStoreFile("TestPrefetch");
205      readStoreFile(storeFile);
206    }, "testPrefetch");
207
208    TEST_UTIL.waitFor(TimeUnit.MINUTES.toMillis(1), new MatcherPredicate<>(otelRule::getSpans,
209      hasItems(hasName("testPrefetch"), hasName("PrefetchExecutor.request"))));
210    final List<SpanData> spans = otelRule.getSpans();
211    if (LOG.isDebugEnabled()) {
212      StringTraceRenderer renderer = new StringTraceRenderer(spans);
213      renderer.render(LOG::debug);
214    }
215
216    final SpanData testSpan = spans.stream().filter(hasName("testPrefetch")::matches).findFirst()
217      .orElseThrow(AssertionError::new);
218    assertThat("prefetch spans happen on their own threads, detached from file open.", spans,
219      hasItem(allOf(hasName("PrefetchExecutor.request"), not(hasParentSpanId(testSpan)))));
220  }
221
222  @Test
223  public void testPrefetchRace() throws Exception {
224    for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
225      Path storeFile = writeStoreFile("TestPrefetchRace-" + i);
226      readStoreFileLikeScanner(storeFile);
227    }
228  }
229
230  /**
231   * Read a storefile in the same manner as a scanner -- using non-positional reads and without
232   * waiting for prefetch to complete.
233   */
234  private void readStoreFileLikeScanner(Path storeFilePath) throws Exception {
235    // Open the file
236    HFile.Reader reader = HFile.createReader(fs, storeFilePath, cacheConf, true, conf);
237    do {
238      long offset = 0;
239      while (offset < reader.getTrailer().getLoadOnOpenDataOffset()) {
240        HFileBlock block =
241          reader.readBlock(offset, -1, false, /* pread= */false, false, true, null, null);
242        offset += block.getOnDiskSizeWithHeader();
243      }
244    } while (!reader.prefetchComplete());
245  }
246
247  private void readStoreFile(Path storeFilePath) throws Exception {
248    readStoreFile(storeFilePath, (r, o) -> {
249      HFileBlock block = null;
250      try {
251        block = r.readBlock(o, -1, false, true, false, true, null, null);
252      } catch (IOException e) {
253        fail(e.getMessage());
254      }
255      return block;
256    }, (key, block) -> {
257      boolean isCached = blockCache.getBlock(key, true, false, true) != null;
258      if (
259        block.getBlockType() == BlockType.DATA || block.getBlockType() == BlockType.ROOT_INDEX
260          || block.getBlockType() == BlockType.INTERMEDIATE_INDEX
261      ) {
262        assertTrue(isCached);
263      }
264    });
265  }
266
267  private void readStoreFileCacheOnly(Path storeFilePath) throws Exception {
268    readStoreFile(storeFilePath, (r, o) -> {
269      HFileBlock block = null;
270      try {
271        block = r.readBlock(o, -1, false, true, false, true, null, null, true);
272      } catch (IOException e) {
273        fail(e.getMessage());
274      }
275      return block;
276    }, (key, block) -> {
277      boolean isCached = blockCache.getBlock(key, true, false, true) != null;
278      if (block.getBlockType() == BlockType.DATA) {
279        assertFalse(block.isUnpacked());
280      } else if (
281        block.getBlockType() == BlockType.ROOT_INDEX
282          || block.getBlockType() == BlockType.INTERMEDIATE_INDEX
283      ) {
284        assertTrue(block.isUnpacked());
285      }
286      assertTrue(isCached);
287    });
288  }
289
290  private void readStoreFile(Path storeFilePath,
291    BiFunction<HFile.Reader, Long, HFileBlock> readFunction,
292    BiConsumer<BlockCacheKey, HFileBlock> validationFunction) throws Exception {
293    readStoreFile(storeFilePath, readFunction, validationFunction, cacheConf);
294  }
295
296  private void readStoreFile(Path storeFilePath,
297    BiFunction<HFile.Reader, Long, HFileBlock> readFunction,
298    BiConsumer<BlockCacheKey, HFileBlock> validationFunction, CacheConfig cacheConfig)
299    throws Exception {
300    // Open the file
301    HFile.Reader reader = HFile.createReader(fs, storeFilePath, cacheConfig, true, conf);
302
303    while (!reader.prefetchComplete()) {
304      // Sleep for a bit
305      Thread.sleep(1000);
306    }
307    long offset = 0;
308    while (offset < reader.getTrailer().getLoadOnOpenDataOffset()) {
309      HFileBlock block = readFunction.apply(reader, offset);
310      BlockCacheKey blockCacheKey = new BlockCacheKey(reader.getName(), offset);
311      validationFunction.accept(blockCacheKey, block);
312      offset += block.getOnDiskSizeWithHeader();
313    }
314  }
315
316  @Test
317  public void testPrefetchCompressed() throws Exception {
318    conf.setBoolean(CACHE_DATA_BLOCKS_COMPRESSED_KEY, true);
319    cacheConf = new CacheConfig(conf, blockCache);
320    HFileContext context = new HFileContextBuilder().withCompression(Compression.Algorithm.GZ)
321      .withBlockSize(DATA_BLOCK_SIZE).build();
322    Path storeFile = writeStoreFile("TestPrefetchCompressed", context);
323    readStoreFileCacheOnly(storeFile);
324    conf.setBoolean(CACHE_DATA_BLOCKS_COMPRESSED_KEY, false);
325  }
326
327  @Test
328  public void testPrefetchDoesntSkipRefs() throws Exception {
329    testPrefetchWhenRefs(false, c -> {
330      boolean isCached = c != null;
331      assertTrue(isCached);
332    });
333  }
334
335  @Test
336  public void testOnConfigurationChange() {
337    PrefetchExecutorNotifier prefetchExecutorNotifier = new PrefetchExecutorNotifier(conf);
338    conf.setInt(PREFETCH_DELAY, 40000);
339    prefetchExecutorNotifier.onConfigurationChange(conf);
340    assertEquals(prefetchExecutorNotifier.getPrefetchDelay(), 40000);
341
342    // restore
343    conf.setInt(PREFETCH_DELAY, 30000);
344    prefetchExecutorNotifier.onConfigurationChange(conf);
345    assertEquals(prefetchExecutorNotifier.getPrefetchDelay(), 30000);
346
347    conf.setInt(PREFETCH_DELAY, 1000);
348    prefetchExecutorNotifier.onConfigurationChange(conf);
349  }
350
351  @Test
352  public void testPrefetchWithDelay() throws Exception {
353    // Configure custom delay
354    PrefetchExecutorNotifier prefetchExecutorNotifier = new PrefetchExecutorNotifier(conf);
355    conf.setInt(PREFETCH_DELAY, 25000);
356    conf.setFloat(PREFETCH_DELAY_VARIATION, 0.0f);
357    prefetchExecutorNotifier.onConfigurationChange(conf);
358
359    HFileContext context = new HFileContextBuilder().withCompression(Compression.Algorithm.GZ)
360      .withBlockSize(DATA_BLOCK_SIZE).build();
361    Path storeFile = writeStoreFile("TestPrefetchWithDelay", context);
362    long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
363    HFile.Reader reader = HFile.createReader(fs, storeFile, cacheConf, true, conf);
364
365    // Wait for 20 seconds, no thread should start prefetch
366    Thread.sleep(20000);
367    assertFalse("Prefetch threads should not be running at this point", reader.prefetchStarted());
368    long timeout = 10000;
369    Waiter.waitFor(conf, 10000, () -> (reader.prefetchStarted() || reader.prefetchComplete()));
370
371    assertTrue(reader.prefetchStarted() || reader.prefetchComplete());
372
373    assertTrue("Prefetch should start post configured delay",
374      getElapsedTime(startTime) > PrefetchExecutor.getPrefetchDelay());
375
376    conf.setInt(PREFETCH_DELAY, 1000);
377    conf.setFloat(PREFETCH_DELAY_VARIATION, PREFETCH_DELAY_VARIATION_DEFAULT_VALUE);
378    prefetchExecutorNotifier.onConfigurationChange(conf);
379  }
380
381  @Test
382  public void testPrefetchDoesntSkipHFileLink() throws Exception {
383    testPrefetchWhenHFileLink(c -> {
384      boolean isCached = c != null;
385      assertTrue(isCached);
386    });
387  }
388
389  private void testPrefetchWhenRefs(boolean compactionEnabled, Consumer<Cacheable> test)
390    throws Exception {
391    cacheConf = new CacheConfig(conf, blockCache);
392    HFileContext context = new HFileContextBuilder().withBlockSize(DATA_BLOCK_SIZE).build();
393    Path tableDir = new Path(TEST_UTIL.getDataTestDir(), "testPrefetchSkipRefs");
394    RegionInfo region =
395      RegionInfoBuilder.newBuilder(TableName.valueOf("testPrefetchSkipRefs")).build();
396    Path regionDir = new Path(tableDir, region.getEncodedName());
397    Pair<Path, byte[]> fileWithSplitPoint =
398      writeStoreFileForSplit(new Path(regionDir, "cf"), context);
399    Path storeFile = fileWithSplitPoint.getFirst();
400    HRegionFileSystem regionFS =
401      HRegionFileSystem.createRegionOnFileSystem(conf, fs, tableDir, region);
402    HStoreFile file = new HStoreFile(fs, storeFile, conf, cacheConf, BloomType.NONE, true);
403    Path ref = regionFS.splitStoreFile(region, "cf", file, fileWithSplitPoint.getSecond(), false,
404      new ConstantSizeRegionSplitPolicy());
405    conf.setBoolean(HBASE_REGION_SERVER_ENABLE_COMPACTION, compactionEnabled);
406    HStoreFile refHsf = new HStoreFile(this.fs, ref, conf, cacheConf, BloomType.NONE, true);
407    refHsf.initReader();
408    HFile.Reader reader = refHsf.getReader().getHFileReader();
409    while (!reader.prefetchComplete()) {
410      // Sleep for a bit
411      Thread.sleep(1000);
412    }
413    long offset = 0;
414    while (offset < reader.getTrailer().getLoadOnOpenDataOffset()) {
415      HFileBlock block = reader.readBlock(offset, -1, false, true, false, true, null, null, true);
416      BlockCacheKey blockCacheKey = new BlockCacheKey(reader.getName(), offset);
417      if (block.getBlockType() == BlockType.DATA) {
418        test.accept(blockCache.getBlock(blockCacheKey, true, false, true));
419      }
420      offset += block.getOnDiskSizeWithHeader();
421    }
422  }
423
424  private void testPrefetchWhenHFileLink(Consumer<Cacheable> test) throws Exception {
425    cacheConf = new CacheConfig(conf, blockCache);
426    HFileContext context = new HFileContextBuilder().withBlockSize(DATA_BLOCK_SIZE).build();
427    Path testDir = TEST_UTIL.getDataTestDir("testPrefetchWhenHFileLink");
428    final RegionInfo hri =
429      RegionInfoBuilder.newBuilder(TableName.valueOf("testPrefetchWhenHFileLink")).build();
430    // force temp data in hbase/target/test-data instead of /tmp/hbase-xxxx/
431    Configuration testConf = new Configuration(this.conf);
432    CommonFSUtils.setRootDir(testConf, testDir);
433    HRegionFileSystem regionFs = HRegionFileSystem.createRegionOnFileSystem(testConf, fs,
434      CommonFSUtils.getTableDir(testDir, hri.getTable()), hri);
435
436    // Make a store file and write data to it.
437    StoreFileWriter writer = new StoreFileWriter.Builder(conf, cacheConf, this.fs)
438      .withFilePath(regionFs.createTempName()).withFileContext(context).build();
439    TestHStoreFile.writeStoreFile(writer, Bytes.toBytes("testPrefetchWhenHFileLink"),
440      Bytes.toBytes("testPrefetchWhenHFileLink"));
441
442    Path storeFilePath = regionFs.commitStoreFile("cf", writer.getPath());
443    Path dstPath = new Path(regionFs.getTableDir(), new Path("test-region", "cf"));
444    HFileLink.create(testConf, this.fs, dstPath, hri, storeFilePath.getName());
445    Path linkFilePath =
446      new Path(dstPath, HFileLink.createHFileLinkName(hri, storeFilePath.getName()));
447
448    // Try to open store file from link
449    StoreFileInfo storeFileInfo = new StoreFileInfo(testConf, this.fs, linkFilePath, true);
450    HStoreFile hsf = new HStoreFile(storeFileInfo, BloomType.NONE, cacheConf);
451    assertTrue(storeFileInfo.isLink());
452
453    hsf.initReader();
454    HFile.Reader reader = hsf.getReader().getHFileReader();
455    while (!reader.prefetchComplete()) {
456      // Sleep for a bit
457      Thread.sleep(1000);
458    }
459    long offset = 0;
460    while (offset < reader.getTrailer().getLoadOnOpenDataOffset()) {
461      HFileBlock block = reader.readBlock(offset, -1, false, true, false, true, null, null, true);
462      BlockCacheKey blockCacheKey = new BlockCacheKey(reader.getName(), offset);
463      if (block.getBlockType() == BlockType.DATA) {
464        test.accept(blockCache.getBlock(blockCacheKey, true, false, true));
465      }
466      offset += block.getOnDiskSizeWithHeader();
467    }
468  }
469
470  private Path writeStoreFile(String fname) throws IOException {
471    HFileContext meta = new HFileContextBuilder().withBlockSize(DATA_BLOCK_SIZE).build();
472    return writeStoreFile(fname, meta);
473  }
474
475  private Path writeStoreFile(String fname, HFileContext context) throws IOException {
476    return writeStoreFile(fname, context, cacheConf);
477  }
478
479  private Path writeStoreFile(String fname, HFileContext context, CacheConfig cacheConfig)
480    throws IOException {
481    Path storeFileParentDir = new Path(TEST_UTIL.getDataTestDir(), fname);
482    StoreFileWriter sfw = new StoreFileWriter.Builder(conf, cacheConfig, fs)
483      .withOutputDir(storeFileParentDir).withFileContext(context).build();
484    Random rand = ThreadLocalRandom.current();
485    final int rowLen = 32;
486    for (int i = 0; i < NUM_KV; ++i) {
487      byte[] k = RandomKeyValueUtil.randomOrderedKey(rand, i);
488      byte[] v = RandomKeyValueUtil.randomValue(rand);
489      int cfLen = rand.nextInt(k.length - rowLen + 1);
490      KeyValue kv = new KeyValue(k, 0, rowLen, k, rowLen, cfLen, k, rowLen + cfLen,
491        k.length - rowLen - cfLen, rand.nextLong(), generateKeyType(rand), v, 0, v.length);
492      sfw.append(kv);
493    }
494
495    sfw.close();
496    return sfw.getPath();
497  }
498
499  private Pair<Path, byte[]> writeStoreFileForSplit(Path storeDir, HFileContext context)
500    throws IOException {
501    StoreFileWriter sfw = new StoreFileWriter.Builder(conf, cacheConf, fs).withOutputDir(storeDir)
502      .withFileContext(context).build();
503    Random rand = ThreadLocalRandom.current();
504    final int rowLen = 32;
505    byte[] splitPoint = null;
506    for (int i = 0; i < NUM_KV; ++i) {
507      byte[] k = RandomKeyValueUtil.randomOrderedKey(rand, i);
508      byte[] v = RandomKeyValueUtil.randomValue(rand);
509      int cfLen = rand.nextInt(k.length - rowLen + 1);
510      KeyValue kv = new KeyValue(k, 0, rowLen, k, rowLen, cfLen, k, rowLen + cfLen,
511        k.length - rowLen - cfLen, rand.nextLong(), generateKeyType(rand), v, 0, v.length);
512      sfw.append(kv);
513      if (i == NUM_KV / 2) {
514        splitPoint = k;
515      }
516    }
517    sfw.close();
518    return new Pair(sfw.getPath(), splitPoint);
519  }
520
521  public static KeyValue.Type generateKeyType(Random rand) {
522    if (rand.nextBoolean()) {
523      // Let's make half of KVs puts.
524      return KeyValue.Type.Put;
525    } else {
526      KeyValue.Type keyType = KeyValue.Type.values()[1 + rand.nextInt(NUM_VALID_KEY_TYPES)];
527      if (keyType == KeyValue.Type.Minimum || keyType == KeyValue.Type.Maximum) {
528        throw new RuntimeException("Generated an invalid key type: " + keyType + ". "
529          + "Probably the layout of KeyValue.Type has changed.");
530      }
531      return keyType;
532    }
533  }
534
535  private long getElapsedTime(long startTime) {
536    return System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
537  }
538}
